column4: hi all. i can't seem to get this machine to boot the install disc. it's an hp pavilion 8240. the error message is "Loading isolinux: Disk error 01, AX = 4286, drive 9F". any ideas?
tried burning at a lower speed? it might help, i have had problems my self booting cd's that are burnt in high speed :(
no, not that one.. but random errors becaus the filesystem is corrupted, i think.
